General.Name: Brand Group (M.G) Ltd
General.Description: Brand Group (M.G) Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in metal construction and infrastructure, energy facilities, petrochemical facilities, and other industrial facilities in Israel. The company constructs large industrial plants, high-rise steel buildings, public buildings, residential buildings, and commercial and business buildings; supply assemblies to stations for producing electrical power with coal, gas, and other technologies; provides construction for transport and infrastructure made of steel; and produce steel accumulators and containers of different sizes and bodies. The company was formerly known as Brand Industries Ltd. and changed its name to Brand Group (M.G) Ltd in November 2021. Brand Group (M.G) Ltd was incorporated in 1978 and is based in Yeruham, Israel.
